```{r}
     
userInput <- as.numeric(readline("Enter a number to start the Fibonacci sequence: "))


a <- 0
b <- 1

cat("Fibonacci sequence starting from", userInput, ": ")
cat(userInput, " ")


repeat {

  nextFibo <- a + b


  if (nextFibo > 500) {
    break
  }


  cat(nextFibo, " ")

 
  a <- b
  b <- nextFibo
}

          
```
